edge_1: Shimazu Koji, the manager of the Osaka Continental Hotel, and his daughter Shimazu Akira, who is also a concierge at the hotel, are old friends of Wick and Caine.
edge_2: Shimazu Akira, Koji's daughter and concierge of the Osaka Continental, works at the Osaka Continental Hotel.

edge_1: Chidi, the second-in-command of the Marquis de Gramont, is subordinate to the Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont.
edge_2: The Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont, a powerful member of the High Table whose position is challenged by Wick, belongs to the High Table.
